name: test_e2e_with_logs[034_SQLI_BLIND_008]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BLIND_008` |
| **Name** | First table name character discovery |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' AND (SELECT SUBSTR(table_name,1,1) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema=database() LIMIT 1)='u' --`
- **Encoded**: `'%20AND%20(SELECT%20SUBSTR(table_name%2C1%2C1)%20FROM%20information_schema.tables%20WHERE%20table_schema%3Ddatabase()%20LIMIT%201)%3D'u'%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~72000ms
- **Timestamp**: 08:55:17.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_BLIND_008-1772268917679-u3iguv pattern_id=SQLI_BLIND_008 uri=/?q='%20AND%20(SELECT%20SUBSTR(table_name%2C1%2C1)%20FROM%20information_schema.tables%20WHERE%20table_schema%3Ddatabase()%20LIMIT%201)%3D'u'%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_BLIND_008-1772268917679-u3iguv pattern_id=SQLI_BLIND_008 uri=/?q='%20AND%20(SELECT%20SUBSTR(table_name%2C1%2C1)%20FROM%20information_schema.tables%20WHERE%20table_schema%3Ddatabase()%20LIMIT%201)%3D'u'%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
08:55:17.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_BLIND_008-1772268917679-u3iguv pattern_id=SQLI_BLIND_008 uri=/?q='%20AND%20(SELECT%20SUBSTR(table_name%2C1%2C1)%20FROM%20information_schema.tables%20WHERE%20table_schema%3Ddatabase()%20LIMIT%201)%3D'u'%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
